lyrics:

live my life right when i see god hell be impressed cause

know when i disappear ima find my way back home cause
you might also likechorus
i dont think they know it yet but i do i do
and if you fuckin with it then you my dude my dude uh

days go by and i think that i

then life gonna be so sweet
nah it aint a hotel hahaha
yeah nah it aint a hotel
im next shh dont tell ha
